trip.name: Baltic Sea Tour 2013
trip.description: During the summer of 2013 two guys cycled around the Baltic Sea. They started in Norrköping, Sweden and also end the trip there. 2 months, 9 countries and 8000 km.

sections.story:
1) Valid passport: CHECK 
2) Application form: CHECK 
3) A photo: CHECK
4) Invitation letter: CHECK
5) Copy of the passport: CHECK
6) Copy of the insurance policy: CHECK
There is nothing that can stop us. Appointment at the consulate on Friday at 10am.

Headwind till Nyköping, downwind from there till Stockholm. 2 punctures. Started at 10.45, which was rather late, so we were in Nyköping at 3, and still had 100km before us. Arrived finally 21.15 at Karro.

gallery.caption: The first puncture just before Nyköping

sections.story: And Karro waited for us with the best lasagne and cake. It feels so good to eat such a nice dinner after such a day. Thank you so much.
Left from Bandhagen at 8.45am, but it took us 2.5 hours to leave Stockholm, but then with a new tire. Arrived 9.30pm in beautiful Löfstabruk, where we tent for the first time.

gallery.caption: The first puncture just before Nyköping

sections.story: We started at 9:30am, and had a very nice headwind almost all the way. We got payback from Mr wind from yesterday's downwind. We stopped 2 times, first in Gävle, second in Axmar bruk. We arrived 19.15 at the weekend house Aldenstam, where we were welcomed with the most important food: sweets.

gallery.caption: The first dip in the Baltic Sea. More to come.
Our wonderful hosts with the wonderful dinner (dessert is not yet on the table). For this it's already worth to cycle.

sections.story: The first day when we finally started in normal time, at 8am. But it took me the half day till I could overcome the trauma of getting up at 6. Because that feeling is not possible to overcome when it's only 11.15 am and you have cycled a very big part of the day. Otherwise this day we got very tired in our brains, because we were driving next to a big road, and that takes a lot of concentration. On the other hand our legs are not that tired. We arrived at 19.45, ate a wonderful dinner, looked at the Sea from the house and went to bed.

gallery.caption: chicken dinner :) there is always a big smile on my face when we eat so delicious food
That's the end of the day.
After dinner, we ate a delicious brownie self made by Frida
The break down list: a bike computer and a kick stand
When Zalán came, I told him that he won't get sunburn from the swedish sun (because I don't get any). I was wrong. Tomorrow we will by some cream.
